root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 8-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
• Material categories accordance to the global EW-MFA guide “UNEP (2021). The use of natural resources in the economy: A Global Manual on Economy Wide Material Flow Accounting” (https://wedocs.unep.org/bitstream/handle/20.500.11822/36253/UNRE.pdf?sequence=3&isAllowed=y);
  • Standard Country or Area Codes for Statistical Use (UN M49 classification of countries and regions)
